description:
Enhance your app's appearance by customizing the scrollbar for a sleek and beautiful look. 

Note that this customization uses WebKit, which are compatible with most modern browsers. For detailed browser compatibility, please refer to the following link: 

https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/::-webkit-scrollbar#browser_compatibility
name: Elegant Scroll
plugin_instructions:
Add scrollbar customization in the plugin tab. 

You can choose to apply it to all pages or only to specific pages using the Elegant Scroll element. 

The Scroll horizontal element allows you to add horizontal scrolling to a group when there is an overflow.
